attributes.action: restore a government that has in place systems of responsibility that the general public can trust in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been created for those people who feel that they have been let down by the government in light of both the recent failures to protect personnel data from being lost not only from HMRC but also the DVLA and feel that they have had no say in the matter and want cast iron assurances that these kind of blunders will not happen again ever and believe that they deserve better from public services that have a high level of responsibility
